snippet.title: LunarLux Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
The LunarLux Kickstarter is launching October 4th! You can back us here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/freedomgamesgg/lunar-lux

LunarLux is a sci-fi adventure RPG that takes place on the Moon! We were inspired by games like Mega Man Battle Network, Star Force, Undertale, and the Mario & Luigi RPG Series!

We would love your support to help us raise funds for our dream game! This is your chance to get exclusive rewards, support the dev team, and help bring LunarLux to the Nintendo Switch!  We've got cool rewards like enamel pins, plushies, posters, and more!👀

Our Chapter 1 Demo is also live on steam! You can play the demo here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1932680/LunarLux/

Please share the campaign with your friends and family so we can reach our goals and bring LunarLux to the world! Thank you so much for your support :D Your RPG Adventure on the Moon awaits!

-CosmicNobab
